Package kademlia.operation

Class ContentLookupOperation

java.lang.Object
kademlia.operation.ContentLookupOperation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Receiver, Operation
public class ContentLookupOperation
extends java.lang.Object
implements Operation, Receiver
Looks up a specified identifier and returns the value associated with it
